title: Ninety Six National Historic Site: Weather
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Weather              Weather         Snow fell on Ninety Six National Historic Site in 2004. Ninety Six National Historic Site  There are four distinct seasons in the South Carolina Upstate but temperature and weather conditions can vary widely within those seasons.  Spring and Fall are generally pleasant with frequent rain showers.  Summer and Winter ranges can be extreme.  Please check The National Weather Service for current conditions.
